alert.note: Alert for Garrard; Jessamine (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 9:38AM EST until February 20 at 5:42PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River at Camp Nelson Lock affecting Garrard and Jessamine Counties. .Heavy rain from the past week have caused the river to rise. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Kentucky River at Camp Nelson Lock. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM EST Monday the stage was 30.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 AM EST Monday was 31.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 17.0 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. If you are affected by these crests take any necessary actions. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index. php?wfo=lmk Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued this afternoon.
